question: 如图,A,B,C是⊙O上的三个点,∠ABC=25°,则∠AOC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, ∠ABC = 25°, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠AOC = 2∠ABC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A、B、P为⊙上的点,若∠APB=40°,则∠AOB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and P are on the circle. If ∠APB = 40°, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because points A, B, and P are three points on ⊙O, and ∠APB = 40°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠APB = 2×40° = 80°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,∠BAD=70°,则∠ACD的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠BAD = 70°, then the size of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ADB = 90°. Since ∠BAD = 70°, therefore ∠B = 20°. Since ∠ACD = ∠B, therefore ∠ACD = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,已知∠OAB=40°,则∠ACB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, it is known that ∠OAB = 40°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA = OB, therefore ∠OBA = ∠OAB = 40°, thus ∠AOB = 180° - ∠OAB - ∠OBA = 100°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 50°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,∠BOC=110°,则∠A的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, ∠BOC = 110°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, and ∠BOC = 110°, therefore ∠A = 1/2 ∠BOC = 1/2 × 110° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,弦AB、CD相交于P,若∠A=30°,∠APD=60°,则∠B等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, chords AB and CD intersect at P. If ∠A = 30°, ∠APD = 60°, then ∠B is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠APD = 60°, therefore ∠BPD = 180° - 60° = 120°. Since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠D = ∠A = 30°, thus ∠B = 180° - 120° - 30° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB于点E,G是⁀{AC}上任意一点,连结AD,GD．⁀{BC}=50°,则∠AGD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, chord CD ⊥ AB at point E, G is any point on the arc AC, connect AD and GD. The arc BC = 50°, then ∠AGD = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, BD, because ⁀{BC} = 50°, therefore ∠BOC = 50°. Since chord CD ⊥ AB, therefore ⁀{BC} = ⁀{BD}, thus ∠BAD = 1/2 ∠BOC = 25°. Since AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ADB = 90°, thus ∠B = 90° - ∠BAD = 65°, therefore ∠AGD = ∠B = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,且∠AOB=90°,则∠C的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, and ∠AOB = 90°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 45°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙O中,AD、BC是圆O的弦,OA⊥BC,∠AOB=50°,CE⊥AD,则∠DCE的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AD and BC are chords of circle O, OA ⊥ BC, ∠AOB = 50°, CE ⊥ AD, then the degree of ∠DCE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA ⊥ BC, therefore AC = AB, therefore ∠D = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 50° = 25°. Since CE ⊥ AD, therefore ∠DCE = 90° - ∠D = 65°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知点A,B,C在⊙O上,且∠BAC=25°,则∠OCB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, and ∠BAC = 25°, then the degree of ∠OCB is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, because OB = OC, ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 2×25° = 50°, therefore ∠OCB = ∠OBC = 1/2(180° - 50°) = 65°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,C是以AB为直径的半圆O上一点,连结AC,BC,分别以AC,BC为边向外作正方形ACDE,BCFG．DE,FG,⁀{AC},⁀{BC}的中点分别是M,N,P,Q．若MP+NQ=12,AC+BC=16,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OP,OQ,∵DE,FG,⁀{AC},⁀{BC}的中点分别是M,N,P,Q,∴OP⊥AC,OQ⊥BC,∵AC∥DE,∴O、P、M三点共线,∴H、I是AC、BD的中点,∴OH+OI=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BC)=8,∵MH+NI=AC+BC=16,MP+NQ=12,∴PH+QI=16-12=4,∴AB=OP+OQ=OH+OI+PH+QI=8+4=12,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, C is a point on the semicircle O with AB as the diameter. Connect AC and BC, and construct squares ACDE and BCFG externally on sides AC and BC, respectively. The midpoints of DE, FG, arc AC, and arc BC are M, N, P, and Q, respectively. If MP + NQ = 12 and AC + BC = 16, then the length of AB is ().
answer_cot_en: Connect OP, OQ, because the midpoints of DE, FG, AC, BC are respectively M, N, P, Q, therefore OP ⊥ AC, OQ ⊥ BC. Since AC ∥ DE, therefore points O, P, M are collinear. Therefore, H, I are the midpoints of AC, BD, therefore OH + OI = 1/2 (AC + BC) = 8. Since MH + NI = AC + BC = 16, MP + NQ = 12, therefore PH + QI = 16 - 12 = 4. Therefore, AB = OP + OQ = OH + OI + PH + QI = 8 + 4 = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,∠BOC=80°,则∠A的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵∠BOC与∠A是同弧所对的圆心角与圆周角,∠BOC=80°,∴∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC=40°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, ∠BOC = 80°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BOC and ∠A are central and circumferential angles corresponding to the same arc, and ∠BOC = 80°, therefore ∠A = 1/2 ∠BOC = 40°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,A、B、C三点在⊙O上,若∠AOB=80°,则∠ACB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O. If ∠AOB = 80°, then ∠ACB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 80° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点D,C在⊙O上,AD∥OC,∠DAB=60°,连接AC,则∠DAC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points D and C are on ⊙O, AD ∥ OC, ∠DAB = 60°, connect AC, then ∠DAC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA = OC, therefore ∠CAO = ∠ACO. Since AD ∥ OC, therefore ∠DAC = ∠ACO, thus ∠DAC = ∠CAB. Given that ∠DAB = 60°, therefore ∠DAC = 1/2 ∠DAB = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,A、B、C、D均在圆上,∠BAC=25°,∠CED=30°,则∠BOD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, A, B, C, and D are all on the circle, ∠BAC = 25°, ∠CED = 30°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BE, because ∠BEC = ∠BAC = 25°, ∠CED = 30°, therefore ∠BED = ∠BEC + ∠CED = 55°, thus ∠BOD = 2∠BED = 110°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,∠BOC=80°,则∠BAC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, ∠BOC = 80°, then the degree of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, and ∠BOC = 80°, therefore ∠BAC = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙O中,OD⊥BC,∠CAD=40°,则∠BOD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, OD ⊥ BC, ∠CAD = 40°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠CAD = 40°, therefore ∠COD = 2∠CAD = 80°. Since OD ⊥ BC, therefore ⁀BD = ⁀CD, thus ∠BOD = ∠COD = 80°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,A、D是⊙O上的两个点,BC是直径,若∠D=35°,则∠ACB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A and D are two points on ⊙O, BC is the diameter. If ∠D = 35°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AB, as shown in the figure, because BC is the diameter, therefore ∠BAC = 90°. Since ∠B = ∠D = 35°, therefore ∠ACB = 90° - 35° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A、B、C是⊙O上的点,∠BOC=60°,则∠BAC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠BOC = 60°, then ∠BAC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: In ⊙O, ∠BOC = 60°, therefore ∠BAC = 1/2 ∠BOC = 1/2 × 60° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,∠ABC=30°,则∠AOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, ∠ABC = 30°, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: ∠AOC = 2∠ABC = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C、D是⊙O上的两点,分别连接AC、BC、CD、OD．若∠DOB=140°,则∠ACD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on ⊙O. Connect AC, BC, CD, and OD respectively. If ∠DOB = 140°, then ∠ACD = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DOB = 140°, therefore ∠AOD = 40°, thus ∠ACD = 1/2 ∠AOD = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,若已知∠BAC=48°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, if it is known that ∠BAC = 48°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 96°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,∠BAC=25°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, ∠BAC = 25°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in ⊙O, ∠BAC = 25°, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是半圆O的直径,D是⁀{AC}上一点,若∠BAC=35°,则∠ADC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of the semicircle O, D is a point on the arc AC. If ∠BAC = 35°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of the semicircle O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Thus ∠ABC = 90° - 35° = 55°. Therefore ∠D = 180° - 55° = 125°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,若∠ADC=55°,则∠BAC的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, if ∠ADC = 55°, then the size of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠B = ∠ADC = 55°, therefore ∠BAC = 90° - ∠B = 35°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知A、B、C在⊙O上,∠A=∠B=19°,则∠AOB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠A = ∠B = 19°, then the degree of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AB, as shown in the figure, because ∠OAB + ∠OBA + ∠AOB = 180°, ∠OAB + ∠OBA + ∠OAC + ∠OBC + ∠C = 180°, therefore ∠AOB = ∠OAC + ∠OBC + ∠C, thus ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB, therefore 1/2 ∠AOB = ∠OAC + ∠OBC = 2×19 = 38°, thus ∠AOB = 76°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AT是⊙O的切线,AB是⊙O的弦,∠B=55°,则∠BAT等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AT is the tangent of ⊙O, AB is the chord of ⊙O, ∠B = 55°, then ∠BAT equals ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, then ∠AOB = 2∠BAT, OA ⊥ AT. Because OA ⊥ AT, therefore ∠OAT = 90°, thus ∠OAB = 90° - ∠BAT. Since ∠B + ∠AOB + ∠OAB = 180°, therefore ∠B + 2∠BAT + 90° - ∠BAT = 180°, solving gives ∠BAT = 35°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙B的半径为4cm,∠MBN=60°,点A、C分别是射线BM、BN上的动点,且直线AC⊥BN．当AC平移到与⊙B相切时,AB的长度是()
answer_cot: 当AC平移到与⊙B相切时,有BC是圆的半径,BC=4,∠ACB=90°,∴AB=BC÷(cos60°)=4×2=8cm．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙B is 4 cm, ∠MBN = 60°, points A and C are moving points on the rays BM and BN respectively, and line AC ⊥ BN. When AC is moved to be tangent to ⊙B, the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: When AC moves to be tangent to ⊙B, BC is the radius of the circle, BC = 4, ∠ACB = 90°, therefore AB = BC / (cos60°) = 4×2 = 8cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,AE切⊙D于点E,AC=CD=DB=10,则线段AE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AE is tangent to ⊙D at point E, AC = CD = DB = 10, then the length of segment AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AE intersects ⊙D at point E, therefore ∠AED = 90°. Since AC = CD = DB = 10, therefore AD = 20, DE = 10, therefore AE = √{AD² - ED²} = √{400 - 100} = 10√3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,DE是⊙O的切线,切点为A．如果∠ABC=50°,那么∠CAE等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, DE is a tangent to ⊙O, with the point of tangency at A. If ∠ABC = 50°, then ∠CAE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE is a tangent to ⊙O, therefore ∠CAE = ∠B = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 图中,EB为半圆O的直径,点A在EB的延长线上,AD切半圆O于点D,BC⊥AD于点C,AB=2,半圆O的半径为2,则BC的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OD．AD是切线,点D是切点,∴BC⊥AD,∴∠ODA=∠ACB=90°,BC∥OD．∵AB=OB=2,则点B是AO的中点,∴BC=\frac{1}{2}OD=1．故选:B．
question_en: In the figure, EB is the diameter of semicircle O, point A is on the extension of EB, AD is tangent to semicircle O at point D, BC ⊥ AD at point C, AB = 2, the radius of semicircle O is 2, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD. AD is a tangent, point D is the point of tangency, therefore BC ⊥ AD, therefore ∠ODA = ∠ACB = 90°, BC ∥ OD. Since AB = OB = 2, then point B is the midpoint of AO, therefore BC = 1/2 OD = 1. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A,B,C,D在⊙O上,若∠B=100°,则∠ADE的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, C, and D are on ⊙O. If ∠B = 100°, then the degree of ∠ADE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because points A, B, C, D are on ⊙O, therefore ∠ADE = ∠B. Since ∠B = 100°, therefore ∠ADE = 100°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,身高为1.6m的某学生想测量学校旗杆的高度,当他站在C处时,他头顶端的影子正好与旗杆顶端的影子重合,并测得AC=2m,BC=8m,则旗杆的高度是()
answer_cot: 设旗杆高度为h,由题意得:\frac{16}{h}=\frac{2}{2+8}解得:h=8米.故选C.
question_en: As shown in the figure, a student with a height of 1.6 m wants to measure the height of the school flagpole. When he stands at point C, the top of his shadow coincides exactly with the top of the flagpole's shadow, and it is measured that AC = 2 m, BC = 8 m, then the height of the flagpole is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the height of the flagpole be h. According to the problem, 16/h = 2/(2+8), solving this gives h = 8 meters. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=6,AC=7,BC=5,边AB的垂直平分线交AC于点D,则△BDC的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵ED是AB的垂直平分线,∴AD=BD.∵△BDC的周长=DB+BC+CD,∴△BDC的周长=AD+BC+CD=AC+BC=7+5=12.故选C
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 6, AC = 7, BC = 5, the perpendicular bisector of side AB intersects AC at point D, then the perimeter of △BDC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ED is the perpendicular bisector of AB, therefore AD = BD. The perimeter of △BDC is DB + BC + CD, therefore the perimeter of △BDC is AD + BC + CD = AC + BC = 7 + 5 = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,CD为⊙O的弦,∠ABD=63°,则∠BCD为()
answer_cot: 连接AC,∵AB是圆的直径,∴∠BCA=90°又∠ACD=∠ABD=63°∴∠BCD=∠ACB-∠ACD=90°-63°=27°.故答案为:C.
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord of ⊙O, ∠ABD = 63°, then ∠BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AC, because AB is the diameter of the circle, therefore ∠BCA = 90°. Also, ∠ACD = ∠ABD = 63°, therefore ∠BCD = ∠ACB - ∠ACD = 90° - 63° = 27°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 将一个矩形纸片按如图所示折叠,若∠1=40°,则∠2的度数是()
answer_cot: 如图可知折叠后的图案∠ABC=∠EBC,又因为矩形对边平行,根据直线平行内错角相等可得∠2=∠DBC,又因为∠2+∠ABC=180°,所以∠EBC+∠2=180°,即∠DBC+∠2=2∠2=180°-∠1=140°可求出∠2=70°
question_en: Fold a rectangular piece of paper as shown in the figure, if ∠1 = 40°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, after folding, ∠ABC = ∠EBC. Also, because the opposite sides of a rectangle are parallel, according to the principle that alternate interior angles of parallel lines are equal, we can find that ∠2 = ∠DBC. Since ∠2 + ∠ABC = 180°, therefore ∠EBC + ∠2 = 180°, which means ∠DBC + ∠2 = 2∠2 = 180° - ∠1 = 140°. Hence, we can calculate that ∠2 = 70°.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,若∠BOD=90°,则∠BCD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is an inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O. If ∠BOD = 90°, then the degree of ∠BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because \(\overset{\frown}{BD} = \overset{\frown}{BD}\), therefore ∠A = 1/2 ∠DOB = 1/2 × 90° = 45°. Since ∠A + ∠BCD = 180°, therefore ∠BCD = 180° - 45° = 135°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠B=32°,将△ABC沿直线m翻折,点B落在点D的位置,则∠1-∠2的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = 32°, fold △ABC along line m, point B falls at the position of point D, then the degree of ∠1 - ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = 32°. Fold △ABC along line m, point B falls at point D's position. Because ∠B = ∠D = 32°, ∠BEH = ∠DEH, ∠1 = 180° - ∠BEH - ∠DEH = 180° - 2∠DEH. ∠2 = 180° - ∠D - ∠DEH - ∠EHF = 180° - ∠B - ∠DEH - (∠B + ∠BEH) = 180° - ∠B - ∠DEH - (∠B + ∠DEH) = 180° - 32° - ∠DEH - 32° - ∠DEH = 180° - 64° - 2∠DEH. ∠1 - ∠2 = 180° - 2∠DEH - (180° - 64° - 2∠DEH) = 180° - 2∠DEH - 180° + 64° + 2∠DEH = 64°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,∠1=68°,直线a平移后得到直线b,则∠2-∠3的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠1 = 68°, after straight line a is translated to obtain straight line b, then the degree of ∠2 - ∠3 is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend line c to intersect with b, let the supplement of ∠2 be ∠4, then ∠4 = 180° - ∠2. Let the vertical angle of ∠3 be ∠5, then ∠3 = ∠5. Because a is parallel to b, therefore ∠6 = ∠1 = 68°. Also, ∠4 + ∠5 = ∠6. Therefore, (180° - ∠2) + ∠3 = 68°, which means: ∠2 - ∠3 = 112°.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,已知AB=AC,DE垂直平分AC,∠A=50°,则∠DCB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, it is known that AB = AC, DE perpendicularly bisects AC, ∠A = 50°, then the degree of ∠DCB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, ∠A = 50° = ∠ABC = ∠ACB = 65°. Since DE perpendicularly bisects AC, therefore ∠DAC = ∠DCA. Thus ∠DCB = ∠ACB - ∠DCA = 65° - 50° = 15°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知AB∥CE,∠A=110°,则∠ADE的大小为()
answer_cot: 由题知,AB//CE,∠A=110°,根据两直线平行,内错角相等,得到∠ADE=110°.所以,选A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB ∥ CE, ∠A = 110°, then the size of ∠ADE is ()
answer_cot_en: From the problem, we know that AB is parallel to CE, and ∠A = 110°. According to the principle that when two lines are parallel, the alternate interior angles are equal, we get ∠ADE = 110°. Therefore, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在等腰三角形ABC中,AB=AC,∠A=40°,线段AB的垂直平分线交AB于点D,交AC于点E,连接BE,则∠CBE等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the isosceles triangle ABC, AB = AC, ∠A = 40°, the perpendicular bisector of line segment AB intersects AB at point D, intersects AC at point E, connect BE, then ∠CBE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, and ∠A = 40°, therefore ∠ABC = 1/2(180° - ∠A) = 1/2 × (180° - 40°) = 70°. Since DE is the perpendicular bisector of AB, AE = BE, therefore ∠ABE = ∠A = 40°, ∠CBE = ∠ABC - ∠ABE = 70° - 40° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 数学在我们的生活中无处不在,就连小小的台球桌上都有数学问题．如图所示,∠1=∠2．若∠3=25°,为了使白球反弹后能将黑球直接撞入底袋中,那么击打白球时,必须保证∠1为()
question_en: Mathematics is everywhere in our lives, even on a small billiard table, there are mathematical problems. As shown in the figure, ∠1 = ∠2. If ∠3 = 25°, in order to make the white ball rebound and directly hit the black ball into the corner pocket, it is necessary to ensure that ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because all four corners of the pool table are right angles, and ∠3 = 25°, therefore ∠2 = 65°. Since ∠1 = ∠2, therefore ∠1 = 65°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点A在直线BG上,AD∥BC,AE平分∠GAD,若∠CBA=80°,则∠GAE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point A is on the straight line BG, AD ∥ BC, AE bisects ∠GAD, if ∠CBA = 80°, then ∠GAE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD is parallel to BC, therefore ∠BAD = ∠CBA = 80°. Since AE bisects ∠GAD, then ∠GAE = 1/2 ∠GAD, therefore 2∠GAE + ∠BAD = 180°, which gives ∠GAE = 50°.

question: 如图,一条公路两次转弯后又回到原来的方向,若第一次转弯时∠B=140°,则∠C的度数()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a road turns twice and then returns to its original direction. If the angle of the first turn ∠B = 140°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠B = ∠C = 140°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点B、D、C是⊙O上的点,∠BDC=130°,则∠BOC是()
answer_cot: 在优弧⁀{BC}上取点E,连接BE,CE,如图所示:∵∠BDC=130°∴∠E=180°∠BDC=50°,∴∠BOC=2∠E=100°.故选:A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, points B, D, and C are on ⊙O, ∠BDC = 130°, then ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Take point E on the major arc BC, connect BE, CE as shown in the figure: Because ∠BDC = 130°, therefore ∠E = 180° - ∠BDC = 50°, thus ∠BOC = 2∠E = 100°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中,∠A=90°,AB=AC,BD平分∠ABC交AC于点D,DE⊥BC于点E,若△CDE的周长为8cm,则斜边BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 90°, AB = AC, BD bisects ∠ABC and intersects AC at point D, DE ⊥ BC at point E, if the perimeter of △CDE is 8 cm, then the length of the hypotenuse BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BD bisects ∠ABC and intersects AC at point D, and ED ⊥ BC, AB ⊥ AC, therefore AD = DE, thus right triangle BDC is congruent to right triangle BDE, therefore DE = DA. Since ED + DC + CE = 8cm, therefore CE + AC = 8cm, and AC = AB = BE, therefore BE + EC = 8cm, thus BC = 8cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中,∠A=∠B=50°,AK=BN,AM=BK,则∠MKN的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = ∠B = 50°, AK = BN, AM = BK, then the degree of ∠MKN is ()
answer_cot_en: Given that ∠A = ∠B, AK = BN, AM = BK, we can conclude that △AMK ≌ BNK, which means ∠MKA = ∠KNB. Therefore, ∠MKA + ∠NKB = ∠KNB + ∠NKB = 180° - 50° = 130°. ∠MKN = 180° - 130° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,七边形ABCDEFG中,AB、ED的延长线交于点O,若∠1、∠2、∠3、∠4对应的邻补角和等于215°,则∠BOD的度数为()
answer_cot: 在DO延长线上找一点M,如图所示,∵多边形AOEFG的外角和为360°,∴∠BOM=360°-215°=145°,∠BOD+∠BOM=180°∴∠BOD=180°-∠BOM=180°-145°=35°.故选B
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the heptagon ABCDEFG, the extensions of AB and ED intersect at point O. If the sum of the adjacent supplementary angles corresponding to ∠1, ∠2, ∠3, and ∠4 is equal to 215°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Find a point M on the extension of DO as shown in the figure. Because the external angle sum of polygon AOEFG is 360°, therefore ∠BOM = 360° - 215° = 145°, ∠BOD + ∠BOM = 180°, therefore ∠BOD = 180° - ∠BOM = 180° - 145° = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线AB∥CD,∠C=36°,∠E为直角,则∠A等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight line AB ∥ CD, ∠C = 36°, ∠E is a right angle, then ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Extend CE to intersect AB at F. Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠C = ∠AFE = 36°. Since ∠E = ∠A + ∠AFE, therefore ∠A = 90° - ∠AFE = 90° - 36° = 54°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,将一个直角三角形纸片ABC(∠ACB=90°),沿线段CD折叠,使点B落在B′处,若∠ACB′=70°,则∠ACD的度数为().
question_en: As shown in the figure, a right-angled triangle paper ABC (∠ACB = 90°) is folded along the line segment CD, so that point B falls at position B′. If ∠ACB′ = 70°, then the degree of ∠ACD is ().
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, we have ∠DCB = ∠DCB' = ∠ACD + ∠ACB'. Also, since ∠ACB = ∠ACD + ∠DCB = 90°, and ∠ACD + ∠ACD + ∠ACB' = 90°, therefore ∠ACB' = 70°, thus ∠ACD = 10°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC⊥AB,交⊙O于点C,连接OA,OB,BC,若∠ABC=15°,则∠AOB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB, intersects ⊙O at point C, connect OA, OB, BC. If ∠ABC = 15°, then the degree of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: ∠ABC = 15°, therefore ∠AOC = 30°. Since OC ⊥ AB, therefore OC bisects ∠AOB, thus ∠AOB = 2∠AOC = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知DC∥FP,∠1=∠2,∠FED=32°,∠AGF=76°,FH平分∠EFG,则∠PFH的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that DC ∥ FP, ∠1 = ∠2, ∠FED = 32°, ∠AGF = 76°, FH bisects ∠EFG, then the degree of ∠PFH is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = ∠2, therefore AB is parallel to FP, thus ∠AGF = ∠PFG = 76°. Since DC is parallel to FP, and FH bisects ∠EFG, therefore ∠FED = ∠EFP = 32°, ∠EFH = ∠HFG. Thus ∠PFH = ∠PFG - ∠HFG = 76° - ∠EFH = 76° - (∠EFP + ∠PFH) = 76° - 32° - ∠PFH. Solving this gives ∠PFH = 22°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,将一块三角板的45°角的顶点放在直尺的一边上,当∠1=63°时,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when the vertex of the 45° angle of a triangular plate is placed on one side of a ruler, if ∠1 = 63°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 = 63°. Thus ∠4 = 180° - 63° - 45° = 72°. Therefore ∠2 = ∠4 = 72°. Hence, the correct answer is: B.

question: 如图,为了估计河的宽度,在河的对岸选定一个目标点A,在近岸取点B,C,D,E,使点A,B,D在一条直线上,且AD⊥DE,点A,C,E也在一条直线上且DE∥BC.如果BC=24m,BD=12m,DE=40m,则河的宽度AB约为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in order to estimate the width of the river, a target point A is selected on the opposite bank of the river. Points B, C, D, and E are taken on the near bank so that points A, B, and D are on a straight line, and AD ⊥ DE. Points A, C, and E are also on a straight line and DE ∥ BC. If BC = 24 m, BD = 12 m, DE = 40 m, then the approximate width of the river AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC ∥ DE, therefore △ABC ∼ △ADE, thus BC/DE = AB/(AB+BD), that is 24/40 = AB/(AB+12), therefore AB = 18m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,a∥b,将三角尺的直角顶点放在直线a上,若∠1=40°,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ∥ b, place the right-angle vertex of the set square on line a, if ∠1 = 40°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 40°, therefore ∠3 = 90° - 40° = 50°. Since line a is parallel to line b, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知点C在线段AB上,点M、N分别是AC、BC的中点,且AB=8cm,则MN的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point C is on line segment AB, points M and N are the midpoints of AC and BC, respectively, and AB = 8 cm, then the length of MN is ()
answer_cot_en: Because M and N are the midpoints of AC and BC respectively, therefore CM = 1/2 AC, CN = 1/2 BC. Thus MN = CM + CN = 1/2 AC + 1/2 BC = 1/2 (AC + BC) = 1/2 AB = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,EF⊥AB于E,EF交CD于F,已知∠1=60°,则∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, EF ⊥ AB at E, EF intersects CD at F, it is known that ∠1 = 60°, then ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because AB is parallel to CD, ∠1 = 60°, therefore ∠3 = ∠1 = 60°. Since EF is perpendicular to AB, therefore ∠FEA = 90°, thus ∠2 = 90° - ∠3 = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙I是△ABC的内切圆,D,E,F为三个切点．若∠DEF=52°,则∠A的度数为()
answer_cot: 连接ID、IF∵⊙I是△ABC的内切圆,∴ID⊥AB1IF⊥AC.又∵⊙I中,∠DIF=2∠DEF=104°,四边形DIFA中,∠IDA=∠IFA=90°,∴∠A=180°-∠DIF=76°.故选A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙I is the inscribed circle of △ABC, D, E, and F are the three tangent points. If ∠DEF = 52°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect ID, IF. Because ⊙I is the inscribed circle of △ABC, therefore ID ⊥ AB and IF ⊥ AC. Also, in ⊙I, ∠DIF = 2∠DEF = 104°. In quadrilateral DIFA, ∠IDA = ∠IFA = 90°, therefore ∠A = 180° - ∠DIF = 76°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,PA是⊙O的切线,若∠PAB=40°,则∠AOB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, PA is the tangent of ⊙O. If ∠PAB = 40°, then ∠AOB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is a tangent to circle O, therefore PA ⊥ AO, thus ∠PAO = 90°. Also, ∠PAB = 40°, ∠BAO = 90° - 40° = 50°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠BAO = ∠B = 50°, then ∠AOB = 180° - 50° - 50° = 80°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙B的半径为4cm,∠MBN=60°,点A,C分别是射线BM,BN上的动点,且直线AC⊥BN.当AC平移到与⊙B相切时,AB的长度是()
answer_cot: ∵直线AC⊥BN,∠MBN=60.∴∠BAC=30.,∵⊙B的半径为4cm,当AC平移到与⊙B相切时,∴AB=2×4=8(cm).故答案选A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙B is 4 cm, ∠MBN = 60°, points A and C are moving points on the rays BM and BN respectively, and line AC ⊥ BN. When AC is moved to be tangent to ⊙B, the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because line AC is perpendicular to BN, ∠MBN = 60°. Therefore, ∠BAC = 30°. Since the radius of ⊙B is 4cm, when AC is moved parallel to touch ⊙B, therefore AB = 2×4 = 8(cm). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,将三角形ABC沿AB方向平移后,到达三角形BDE的位置．若∠CAB=50°,∠ABC=100°,则∠1的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵将△ABC沿直线AB向右平移后到达△BDE的位置,∴AC∥BE,∴∠CAB=∠EBD=50°,∵∠ABC=100°,∴∠1的度数为:180°-50°-100°=30°.故选A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, triangle ABC is translated in the direction of AB to reach the position of triangle BDE. If ∠CAB = 50°, ∠ABC = 100°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is translated to the right along line AB to reach the position of △BDE, therefore AC ∥ BE, thus ∠CAB = ∠EBD = 50°. Since ∠ABC = 100°, therefore the degree of ∠1 is: 180° - 50° - 100° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,直线BC与MN相交于点O,AO⊥BC,OE平分∠BON,若∠EON=20°,则∠AOM的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight line BC intersects MN at point O, AO ⊥ BC, OE bisects ∠BON, if ∠EON = 20°, then the degree of ∠AOM is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OE bisects ∠BON, therefore ∠BON = 2∠EON = 40°. Thus ∠COM = ∠BON = 40°. Since AO ⊥ BC, therefore ∠AOC = 90°. Thus ∠AOM = 90° - ∠COM = 90° - 40° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB∥CD∥EF,AC∥DF,若∠BAC=120°,则∠DFE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AC ∥ DF, if ∠BAC = 120°, then the degree of ∠DFE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, and ∠BAC = 120°, therefore ∠BAC + ∠ACD = 180°, thus ∠ACD = 60°. Since AC is parallel to DF, therefore ∠ACD = ∠CDF, thus ∠CDF = 60°. Because CD is parallel to EF, therefore ∠CDF + ∠DFE = 180°, thus ∠DFE = 120°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图AB∥CD,∠ABE=120°,∠ECD=25°,则∠E=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, ∠ABE = 120°, ∠ECD = 25°, then ∠E = ()
answer_cot_en: Draw EF parallel to CD through point E, as shown in the figure: Since AB is parallel to CD, therefore EF is parallel to AB, ∠ABE = 120°, therefore ∠BEF = 60°. Since EF is parallel to CD, ∠ECD = 25°, therefore ∠FEC = ∠ECD = 25°. Thus ∠E = ∠BEF + ∠ECD = 60° + 25° = 85°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,∠A=40°,以AB为直径的半圆与BC、AC分别相交于点D、E,则弧BD的度数为()
answer_cot: 如图,连接AD,OD,∵AB为直径,∴∠ADB=90°,即AD⊥BC,又∵AB=AC,∴AD平分∠BAC,而∠BAC=40°,∴∠BAD=∠DAC=20°,∴∠BOD=40°即弧BD的度数为40°,故选:B.
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, ∠A = 40°, the semicircle with AB as the diameter intersects BC and AC at points D and E, respectively, then the degree measure of arc BD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect AD, OD. Because AB is the diameter, therefore ∠ADB = 90°, that is, AD ⊥ BC. Also, since AB = AC, therefore AD bisects ∠BAC, and ∠BAC = 40°, therefore ∠BAD = ∠DAC = 20°, thus ∠BOD = 40°, which means the degree of arc BD is 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,上午9时,一条船从A处出发以20里/时的速度向正北航行,11时到达B处,从A、B望灯塔C,测得∠NAC=36°,∠NBC=72°,那么从B处到灯塔C的距离是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, at 9 a.m., a boat departs from point A at a speed of 20 miles per hour heading due north and arrives at point B at 11 a.m. Observing the lighthouse C from points A and B, ∠NAC is measured to be 36°, ∠NBC is measured to be 72°, then the distance from point B to the lighthouse C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠NAC = 36°, ∠NBC = 72°, therefore ∠ACB = ∠NBC - ∠NAC = 36°, thus ∠NAC = ∠ACB, therefore BC = BA = 20 × (11 - 9) = 20 × 2 = 40. Answer: The distance between Seabird B and Lighthouse C is 40 miles. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,将含30°角的直角三角板ABC的直角顶点C放在直尺的一边上,已知∠A=30°,∠1=40°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the right-angle vertex C of the right-angled triangle ruler ABC with a 30° angle is placed on one side of the ruler. It is known that ∠A = 30°, ∠1 = 40°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because EF is parallel to MN, and ∠1 = 40°, therefore ∠1 = ∠3 = 40°. Since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠2 = ∠A + ∠3 = 70°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线a、b相交于点O,若∠1=30°,则∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines a and b intersect at point O, if ∠1 = 30°, then ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 + ∠2 = 180°, and ∠1 = 30°, therefore ∠2 = 150°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AE交CD于C,∠A=35°,∠DEC=90°,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AE intersects CD at C, ∠A = 35°, ∠DEC = 90°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, and ∠A = 35°, therefore ∠DCE = ∠A = 35°. Since ∠DEC = 90°, therefore ∠D = 90° - ∠DCE = 90° - 35° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知线段AB=20cm,C为AB的中点,D为CB上一点,E为DB的中点,且EB=3cm,则CD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the line segment AB = 20 cm, C is the midpoint of AB, D is a point on CB, E is the midpoint of DB, and EB = 3 cm, then CD equals ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = 20cm, and C is the midpoint of AB, therefore BC = 1/2 AB = 10cm. Because E is the midpoint of DB, and EB = 3cm, therefore DB = 2EB = 6cm. Therefore, CD = BC - DB = 4cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D在BC边上,BD=AD=AC,E为CD的中点,若∠CAE=16°,则∠B的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point D is on side BC, BD = AD = AC, E is the midpoint of CD, if ∠CAE = 16°, then the size of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD = AC, and point E is the midpoint of CD, therefore AE ⊥ CD, thus ∠AEC = 90°. Therefore, ∠C = 90° - ∠CAE = 74°. Since AD = AC, therefore ∠ADC = ∠C = 74°. Since AD = BD, therefore 2∠B = ∠ADC = 74°, thus ∠B = 37°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 点P是正方形ABCD边AB上一点(不与A、B重合),连接PD并将线段PD绕点P顺时针旋转90°,得线段PE,连接BE,则∠CBE等于()
answer_cot: 过点E作EF⊥AF,交AB的延长线于点F,则∠F=90°,四边形ABCD为正方形,∴AD=AB,∠A=∠ABC=90°∴∠ADP+∠APD=90°,由旋转可得:PD=PE,∠DPE=90°∴∠APD+∠EPF=90°,∴∠ADP=∠EPF在△APD和△FEP中∵≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠ADP=∠FPE}\\{∠A=∠F}\\{PD=EP}\end{array}\right.∴△APD≌△FEP(AAS),∴AP=EF,AD=PF,又∵AD=AB,∴PF=AB,即AP+PB=PB+BF,∴AP=BF,∴BF=EF,又∠F=90°,∴△BEF为等腰直角三角形,∴∠EBF=45°,又∠CBF=90°,则∠CBE=45°故选D.
question_en: Point P is a point on the side AB of the square ABCD (not coinciding with A or B), connect PD and rotate the line segment PD 90° clockwise around point P to obtain line segment PE, connect BE, then ∠CBE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Draw EF ⊥ AF through point E, intersecting the extension line of AB at point F, then ∠F = 90°. Quadrilateral ABCD is a square, therefore AD = AB, ∠A = ∠ABC = 90°. Therefore ∠ADP + ∠APD = 90°. By rotation, it can be obtained that PD = PE, ∠DPE = 90°. Therefore ∠APD + ∠EPF = 90°, thus ∠ADP = ∠EPF. In △APD and △FEP, because ∠ADP = ∠FPE, ∠A = ∠F, and PD = EP, therefore △APD ≌ △FEP (AAS), thus AP = EF, AD = PF. Also, since AD = AB, therefore PF = AB, that is, AP + PB = PB + BF, therefore AP = BF, thus BF = EF, and ∠F = 90°, therefore △BEF is an isosceles right triangle, thus ∠EBF = 45°. Also, ∠CBF = 90°, then ∠CBE = 45°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知正方形的B面积为144,正方形C的面积为169时,那么正方形A的面积为()
answer_cot: 根据题意知正方形的B面积为144,正方形C的面积为169,则字母A所代表的正方形的面积=169-144=25.故选:D.
question_en: As shown in the figure, when the area of square B is 144, and the area of square C is 169, then the area of square A is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, the area of square B is 144, the area of square C is 169, then the area represented by letter A in the square is 169 - 144 = 25. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,A、B、C是⊙O上三点,若∠ACB=20°,则∠AOB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O. If ∠ACB = 20°, then the degree of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 20°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠ACB = 40°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD的对角线AC,BD相交于点O,点E,F分别是线段AO,BO的中点,若AC+BD=24厘米,△OAB的周长是18厘米,则EF为()
answer_cot: ∵平行四边形ABCD的对角线AC,BD相交于点O,∴AO=CO,BO=DO,∵AC+BD=24厘米,∴AO+BO=12厘米,∵△OAB的周长是18厘米,∴AB=6厘米,∵点E,F分别是线段AO,BO的中点,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}AB=3cm.故选:A.
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diagonals AC and BD of the parallelogram ABCD intersect at point O, points E and F are the midpoints of line segments AO and BO, respectively. If AC + BD = 24 cm, the perimeter of △OAB is 18 cm, then EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the diagonals AC and BD of parallelogram ABCD intersect at point O, therefore AO = CO, BO = DO. Since AC + BD = 24 cm, therefore AO + BO = 12 cm. Since the perimeter of △OAB is 18 cm, therefore AB = 6 cm. Since points E and F are the midpoints of segments AO and BO respectively, therefore EF = 1/2 AB = 3 cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,a∥b,∠3=135°,则∠1的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ∥ b, ∠3 = 135°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: From the diagram, we know that ∠2 = ∠3 (vertical angles are equal), therefore ∠2 = 135°. Since a is parallel to b, therefore ∠1 = 180° - ∠2 = 180° - 135° = 45°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,把一块含有45°角的直角三角板的两个顶点放在直尺的对边上．如果∠1=15°,则∠2的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when placing two vertices of a right-angled triangle board with a 45° angle on the opposite sides of a ruler. If ∠1 = 15°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Due to the parallel sides of the ruler, ∠1 = ∠3 = 15°, therefore ∠2 = 45° and ∠3 = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知直线AB,CD,EF相交于点O,∠1=95°,∠2=53°,则∠BOE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the lines AB, CD, EF intersect at point O, ∠1 = 95°, ∠2 = 53°, then the degree of ∠BOE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BOE and ∠AOF are vertically opposite angles, therefore ∠BOE = ∠AOF. Given that ∠1 = 95° and ∠2 = 53°, and ∠COD is a straight angle, therefore ∠AOF = 180° - ∠1 - ∠2 = 180° - 95° - 53° = 32°, which means ∠BOE = 32°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,若AB∥CD,则∠α=130°,∠β=80°,则∠γ=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if AB ∥ CD, then ∠α = 130°, ∠β = 80°, then ∠γ = ()
answer_cot_en: Draw EF through point E parallel to AB, because ∠α = 130°, therefore ∠AEF = 180° - ∠α = 180° - 130° = 50°. ∠β = 80°, therefore ∠CEF = ∠β - ∠AEF = 80° - 50° = 30°. Since AB is parallel to CD, and EF is parallel to AB, therefore EF is parallel to CD, thus ∠γ = ∠CEF = 30°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,将△ABC沿DE、EF翻折,顶点A,B均落在点O处,且EA与EB重合于线段EO,若∠CDO+∠CFO=106°,则∠C的度数()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is folded along DE and EF, with vertices A and B both falling on point O, and EA coinciding with EB on line segment EO. If ∠CDO + ∠CFO = 106°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, connect AO, BO. According to the problem, EA = EB = EO, therefore ∠AOB = 90°, ∠OAB + ∠OBA = 90°. Since DO = DA, FO = FB, therefore ∠DAO = ∠DOA, ∠FOB = ∠FBO, ∠CDO = 2∠DAO, ∠CFO = 2∠FBO. Given that ∠CDO + ∠CFO = 106°, therefore 2∠DAO + 2∠FBO = 106°, thus ∠DAO + ∠FBO = 53°, ∠CAB + ∠CBA = ∠DAO + ∠OAB + ∠OBA + ∠FBO = 143°, thus ∠C = 180° - (∠CAB + ∠CBA) = 180° - 143° = 37°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线a、b相交,∠1=130°,则∠2+∠3=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines a and b intersect, ∠1 = 130°, then ∠2 + ∠3 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 130° and ∠1 + ∠3 = 180°, ∠3 = 180° - ∠1 = 50°. Since ∠3 = ∠2 (vertical angles are equal), therefore ∠2 + ∠3 = 100°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,长方形纸片按图①中的虚线第一次折叠得图②,折痕与长方形的一边形成的∠1=65°,再按图②中的虚线进行第二次折叠得到图③,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the rectangular paper is folded for the first time along the dotted line in figure ① to obtain figure ②, the crease forms an angle ∠1 = 65° with one side of the rectangle. After the second fold along the dotted line in figure ② to obtain figure ③, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, according to the property of folding, ∠5 = ∠1 = 65°, therefore ∠3 = ∠4 = 1/2(180° - ∠1 - ∠5) = 25°. Since the opposite sides of a rectangle are parallel, therefore ∠2 = ∠3 = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线AB、CD相交于点O,OE平分∠AOD,若∠COE=140°,则∠BOC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines AB and CD intersect at point O, OE bisects ∠AOD, if ∠COE = 140°, then ∠BOC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠COE = 140°, therefore ∠EOD = 40°. Since OE bisects ∠AOD, therefore ∠AOE = ∠EOD = 40°, thus ∠AOD = 80°, therefore ∠COB = 80°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,AB∥CO,∠B=22°,则∠A=().
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, AB ∥ CO, ∠B = 22°, then ∠A = ().
answer_cot_en: Because BA is parallel to CO, therefore ∠A = ∠AOC. Since ∠B = 22°, therefore ∠AOC = 2∠B = 44°, thus ∠A = 44°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 已知,如图,AB∥CD,∠ACD=55°,则∠BAC=()
question_en: As known, as shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, ∠ACD = 55°, then ∠BAC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠BAC = ∠ACD. Given that ∠ACD = 55°, therefore ∠BAC = 55°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD绕点D逆时针旋转40°,得到平行四边形A'B'C'D(点A'是A点的对应点,点B’是B点的对应点,点C'是C点的对应点),并且A'点恰好落在AB边上,则∠B的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, parallelogram ABCD rotates 40° counterclockwise around point D, resulting in parallelogram A'B'C'D (point A' corresponds to point A, point B’ corresponds to point B, point C' corresponds to point C), and point A' falls exactly on side AB, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: From the problem, DA = DA′, ∠ADA′ = 40°, therefore ∠A = ∠DA′A = 1/2(180° - 40°) = 70°. Therefore, quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, thus AD || BC, therefore ∠B + ∠A = 180°, thus ∠B = 110°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,若它的一个外角∠DCE=70°,则∠BOD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O. If one of its exterior angles ∠DCE = 70°, then ∠BOD = ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, therefore ∠A = ∠DCE = 70°. Thus ∠BOD = 2∠A = 140°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,一个空间几何体的主视图和左视图都是边长为1的正三角形,俯视图是一个圆,那么这个几何体的侧面积是()
answer_cot: 由图片中的三视图可以看出这个几何体应该是圆锥,且其底面圆半径为\frac{1}{2},母线长为1,因此它的侧面积=π×\frac{1}{2}×1=\frac{π}{2}．故选D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, if the main view and the left view of a spatial geometric body are both equilateral triangles with a side length of 1, and the top view is a circle, then the lateral area of this geometric body is ()
answer_cot_en: From the three views in the picture, it can be seen that this geometric body should be a cone, and its base circle radius is 1/2, and the slant height is 1, therefore its lateral area = π × 1/2 × 1 = π/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,矩形ABCD中,AB=4,AD=3,则cosα的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 4, AD = 3, then the value of cosα is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = 4, AD = 3, and ∠A = 90°, therefore DB = √(3² + 4²) = 5, thus cosα = AB/BD = 4/5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦且CD⊥AB,BC=6,AC=8,则sin∠ABD的值是()
answer_cot: ∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD⊥AB,∴弧AC=弧AD,∴∠ABD=∠ABC．根据勾股定理求得AB=10,∴sin∠ABD=sin∠ABC=\frac{8}{10}=\frac{4}{5}．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord and CD ⊥ AB, BC = 6, AC = 8, then the value of sin∠ABD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, and CD ⊥ AB, therefore arc AC = arc AD, thus ∠ABD = ∠ABC. According to the Pythagorean theorem, AB = 10, therefore sin∠ABD = sin∠ABC = 8/10 = 4/5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 在△ABC中,∠C=90°,BC=5,AB=13,则sinA的值是()
question_en: In △ABC, ∠C = 90°, BC = 5, AB = 13, then the value of sinA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, BC = 5, AB = 13, therefore sinA = BC / AB = 5 / 13. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,延长直角△ABC的斜边AB到点D,使BD=AB,连接CD,若cot∠BCD=3,则tan∠A的值是()
answer_cot: 如图:做DE⊥AC于E,那么BC∥DE,△ABC∽△ADE．∴\frac{AB}{AD}=\frac{AC}{AE},即\frac{AB}{AB+BD}=\frac{AC}{AC+CE}．又由AB=BD,因此AC=CE．根据BC⊥AC,∠BCE=90°,tan∠DCE=cot∠EDC=cot∠BCD=3,直角三角形DCE中,tan∠DCE=\frac{DE}{CE}=3．直角三角形ADE中,tan∠A=\frac{DE}{AE}=\frac{DE}{2CE}=\frac{3}{2}．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, extend the hypotenuse AB of the right-angled triangle ABC to point D, making BD = AB. Connect CD. If cot∠BCD = 3, then the value of tan∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure: Draw DE ⊥ AC at E, then BC ∥ DE, △ABC ∼ △ADE. Therefore, AB/AD = AC/AE, which means AB/(AB+BD) = AC/(AC+CE). Given that AB = BD, therefore AC = CE. According to BC ⊥ AC, ∠BCE = 90°, tan∠DCE = cot∠EDC = cot∠BCD = 3, in right triangle DCE, tan∠DCE = DE/CE = 3. In right triangle ADE, tan∠A = DE/AE = DE/(2CE) = 3/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC中,DE∥BC,且AE:EC=1:3,若S~△ABC~=16,则△ADE的面积是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, and AE:EC = 1:3, if the area of △ABC is 16, then the area of △ADE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AE/EC = 1/3, therefore AE/AC = 1/4. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of the area of △ADE to the area of △ABC equals (AE/AC)², that is, the ratio of the area of △ADE to 16 equals 1/16. Solving this, we find that the area of △ADE equals 1. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{1}{3},AD=2．则BD的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{DE}{BC} = \frac{1}{3}\), AD = 2. Then the value of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore AD/AB = DE/BC, which means 2/AB = 1/3, solving this, we get AB = 6, then BD = AB - AD = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D是AB边上的一点,∠ACD=∠B,AD=1,AC=2,若△ADC的面积为0.8,则△BCD的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point D is a point on side AB, ∠ACD = ∠B, AD = 1, AC = 2, if the area of △ADC is 0.8, then the area of △BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACD = ∠B, and ∠A = ∠A, therefore △ACD is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of the area of △ACD to the area of △ABC is (AD/AC)² = 1/4. Given that the area of △ACD is 0.8, therefore the area of △ABC is 3.2, and the area of △BCD is the area of △ABC minus the area of △ACD, which equals 2.4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,D为△ABC边AB上一点,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{2}{3},DE∥BC交AC于E,DE=6,则BC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D is a point on side AB of △ABC, \(\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{2}{3}\), DE ∥ BC intersects AC at E, DE = 6, then BC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore AD/AB = DE/BC. Given that AD/AB = 2/3, and DE = 6, therefore BC = 6 × 3/2 = 9. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D是AB边上的一点,若∠ACD=∠B,AD=1,AC=2,△ADC的面积为3,则△BCD的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point D is a point on side AB. If ∠ACD = ∠B, AD = 1, AC = 2, the area of △ADC is 3, then the area of △BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACD = ∠B, ∠CAD = ∠BAC, therefore △ACD is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of the area of △ABC to the area of △ACD is (AC/AD)² = 4. Since the area of △ACD is 3, therefore the area of △ABC is 4 times the area of △ACD which equals 12, therefore the area of △BCD is the area of △ABC minus the area of △ACD which equals 9. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,AC上,DE∥BC．已知DE=6,\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{3}{4},那么BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC. It is known that DE = 6, \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{3}{4}\), then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore DE/BC = AD/AB. Given that AD/DB = 3/4, therefore AD/AB = 3/7, therefore 6/BC = 3/7, solving this gives: BC = 14. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知山坡AB的坡度为1:2,BC=1,则坡长AB=()
answer_cot: ∵梯形护坡坝AB的坡度为i=1:2,坡高BC=1,∴\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{1}{2},∴AC=2,根据勾股定理,得AB=√{AC²+BC²}=√{2²+1²}=√{5}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the slope of the hillside AB is 1:2, BC = 1, then the slope length AB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because the slope of the trapezoidal revetment dam AB is i = 1:2, and the slope height BC = 1, therefore BC/AC = 1/2, thus AC = 2. According to the Pythagorean theorem, we get AB = √(AC² + BC²) = √(2² + 1²) = √5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{1}{3},则\frac{DE}{BC}等于()>
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{BD} = \frac{1}{3}\), then \(\frac{DE}{BC}\) is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD/BD = 1/3, therefore AD/AB = 1/4. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, thus DE/BC = AD/AB = 1/4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,在正方形ABCD中,G为CD边中点,连接AG并延长交BC边的延长线于E点,对角线BD交AG于F点．已知FG=2,则线段AE的长度为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD为正方形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴∠ABF=∠GDF,∠BAF=∠DGF,∴△ABF∽△GDF,∴\frac{AF}{GF}=\frac{AB}{GD}=2,∴AF=2GF=4,∴AG=6．∵CG∥AB,AB=2CG,∴CG为△EAB的中位线,∴AE=2AG=12．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the square ABCD, G is the midpoint of side CD, connect AG and extend it to intersect the extension of side BC at point E, diagonal BD intersects AG at point F. It is known that FG = 2, then the length of line segment AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a square, therefore AB = CD, and AB is parallel to CD, therefore ∠ABF = ∠GDF, ∠BAF = ∠DGF, therefore △ABF is similar to △GDF, therefore AF/GF = AB/GD = 2, therefore AF = 2GF = 4, therefore AG = 6. Because CG is parallel to AB, and AB = 2CG, therefore CG is the midline of △EAB, therefore AE = 2AG = 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AD=18,点E、F分别是BD、CD上的点,EF∥BC,且\frac{DE}{EB}=\frac{1}{2},则EF等于()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴BC=AD=18,∵EF∥BC,且\frac{DE}{EB}=\frac{1}{2},∴EF=\frac{1}{3}BC=\frac{1}{3}×18=6．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AD = 18, points E and F are respectively on BD and CD, EF ∥ BC, and \(\frac{DE}{EB} = \frac{1}{2}\), then EF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore BC = AD = 18. Since EF ∥ BC, and DE/EB = 1/2, therefore EF = 1/3 BC = 1/3 × 18 = 6. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,∠A=30°,CD⊥AB于D,则△CBD与△ABC的周长比是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 30°, CD ⊥ AB at D, then the perimeter ratio of △CBD to △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in right triangle ABC, ∠A = 30°, therefore AB = 2BC, which means BC/AB = 1/2. Also, since CD ⊥ AB, therefore ∠BDC = ∠BCA = 90°. Since ∠B = ∠B, therefore triangle BCD is similar to triangle BAC, therefore the ratio of the area of triangle BCD to the area of triangle BAC is BC/AB = 1/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D、E分别是边AB、AC上的点,且DE∥BC,若△ADE与△ABC的周长之比为2:3,AD=4,则DB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are points on sides AB and AC respectively, and DE ∥ BC. If the ratio of the perimeters of △ADE to △ABC is 2:3, and AD = 4, then the length of DB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC. Since the ratio of the perimeters of △ADE to △ABC is 2:3, therefore the ratio of AD to AB is 2:3. Given that AD = 4, therefore AB = 6, thus DB = AB - AD = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 在△ABC中,分别以AB,AC为斜边作Rt△ABD和Rt△ACE,∠ADB=∠AEC=90°,∠ABD=∠ACE=30°,连接ED,若DE=5,则BC长为()
question_en: In △ABC, Rt△ABD and Rt△ACE are constructed with AB and AC as the hypotenuses respectively, ∠ADB = ∠AEC = 90°, ∠ABD = ∠ACE = 30°. Connect ED, if DE = 5, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ADB = ∠AEC = 90°, ∠ABD = ∠ACE = 30°, therefore △ABD is similar to △ACE, AD = 1/2 AB, therefore ∠BAD = ∠CAE, AB:AC = AD:AE, therefore ∠BAC = ∠DAE, AB:AD = AC:AE, therefore △ABC is similar to △ADE, therefore BC/DE = 2. Given that DE = 5, therefore BC = 10. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC中,D为BC上一点,∠BAD=∠C,AB=6,BD=4,则CD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is a point on BC, ∠BAD = ∠C, AB = 6, BD = 4, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BAD = ∠C, and ∠B = ∠B, therefore △BAD is similar to △BCA, thus BA/BC = BD/BA. Given that AB = 6, BD = 4, therefore 6/BC = 4/6, thus BC = 9, therefore CD = BC - BD = 9 - 4 = 5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD:AB=1:3,若△ADE的面积等于3,则△ABC的面积等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD:AB = 1:3, if the area of △ADE is equal to 3, then the area of △ABC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore the ratio of the area of △ADE to the area of △ABC equals (AD/AB)², which equals (1/3)², which equals 1/9. Given that the area of △ADE is 3, therefore the area of △ABC is 27. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,⊙O的直径AB⊥弦CD,且∠BAC=40°,则∠BOD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O and is perpendicular to chord CD, and ∠BAC = 40°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because the diameter AB of ⊙O is perpendicular to chord CD, therefore BC = BD. Since ∠BAC = 40°, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 80°. Because BC = BD, therefore ∠BOD = ∠BOC = 80°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,点A、B、C是⊙O上,∠AOB=80°,则∠ACB的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵∠AOB与∠ACB是同弧所对的圆心角与圆周角,∠AOB=80°,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=40°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠AOB = 80°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB and ∠ACB are central and circumferential angles corresponding to the same arc, and ∠AOB = 80°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,AC是⊙O的直径,∠C=60°,∠ABC的平分线BD交⊙O于点D,则∠BAD的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵AC是⊙O的直径,∴∠ABC=90°,∵∠C=60°,∴∠BAC=30°,∵∠ABC的平分线BD交⊙O于点D,∴∠ABD=∠DBC=45°,∴∠CAD=∠DBC=45°,∴∠BAD=∠BAC+∠CAD=30°+45°=75°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an inscribed triangle of ⊙O, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠C = 60°, the bisector of ∠ABC, BD, intersects ⊙O at point D, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ABC = 90°. Since ∠C = 60°, therefore ∠BAC = 30°. Since the bisector of ∠ABC, BD, intersects ⊙O at point D, therefore ∠ABD = ∠DBC = 45°. Thus ∠CAD = ∠DBC = 45°. Therefore ∠BAD = ∠BAC + ∠CAD = 30° + 45° = 75°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知AB是△ABC外接圆的直径,∠A=32°,则∠B的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB is the diameter of the circumscribed circle of △ABC, ∠A = 32°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of the circumscribed circle of △ABC, therefore ∠C = 90°. Since ∠A = 32°, therefore ∠B = 90° - ∠A = 58°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,∠B=52°,∠C=18°,则∠A的度数为()
answer_cot: 由圆周角定理可得∠O=2∠A,则∠C+2∠A=∠B+∠A,即18°+2∠A=52°+∠A,解得∠A=34°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠B = 52°, ∠C = 18°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: From the Inscribed Angle Theorem, we can get ∠O = 2∠A, then ∠C + 2∠A = ∠B + ∠A, that is, 18° + 2∠A = 52° + ∠A, solving this gives ∠A = 34°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,A、B、C是⊙O上的三点,且∠ABD=70°,AB=BD,则∠O的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵△ABD中,∠ABD=70°,AB=BD,∴∠BAD=\frac{180°-70°}{2}=55°．∵∠BAD与∠O是同弧所对的圆周角与圆心角,∴∠O=2∠BAD=2×55°=110°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, and ∠ABD = 70°, AB = BD, then the degree of ∠O is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABD, ∠ABD = 70°, and AB = BD, therefore ∠BAD = (180° - 70°) / 2 = 55°. Since ∠BAD and ∠O are angles subtended by the same arc, therefore ∠O = 2∠BAD = 2×55° = 110°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知⊙O是△ABD的外接圆,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的弦,∠ABD=50°,则∠BCD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ⊙O is the circumscribed circle of △ABD, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a chord of ⊙O, ∠ABD = 50°, then ∠BCD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ADB = 90°, thus ∠A = 90° - ∠ABD = 90° - 50° = 40°, therefore ∠BCD = ∠A = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,量角器的直径与直角三角板ABC的斜边AB重合,其中量角器0刻度线的端点N与点A重合射线CP从CA处出发沿顺时针方向以每秒2度的速度旋转,CP与量角器的半圆弧交于点E,第30秒时点E在量角器上对应的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接OE,∵∠ACB=90°,∴点C在以AB为直径的圆上,即点C在⊙O上,∴∠EOA=2∠ECA,∵∠ECA=2×30°=60°,∴∠AOE=2∠ECA=2×60°=120°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diameter of the protractor coincides with the hypotenuse AB of the right-angled triangle ABC, where the endpoint N of the 0-degree scale line of the protractor coincides with point A. The ray CP starts from CA and rotates clockwise at a speed of 2 degrees per second. CP intersects the semicircular arc of the protractor at point E. The corresponding degree of point E on the protractor at the 30th second is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OE, because ∠ACB = 90°, therefore point C is on the circle with AB as the diameter, that is, point C is on ⊙O, therefore ∠EOA = 2∠ECA. Since ∠ECA = 2×30° = 60°, therefore ∠AOE = 2∠ECA = 2×60° = 120°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,半径为5的⊙A中,弦BC,ED所对的圆心角分别是∠BAC,∠EAD．已知DE=6,∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,则弦BC的弦心距等于()
answer_cot: 作AH⊥BC于H,作直径CF,连结BF,如图,∵∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,而∠BAC+∠BAF=180°,∴∠DAE=∠BAF,∴⁀{DE}=⁀{BF},∴DE=BF=6,∵AH⊥BC,∴CH=BH,而CA=AF,∴AH为△CBF的中位线,∴AH=\frac{1}{2}BF=3．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙A with a radius of 5, the central angles corresponding to chords BC and ED are ∠BAC and ∠EAD, respectively. Given that DE = 6 and ∠BAC + ∠EAD = 180°, then the chord distance from the center to chord BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw AH ⊥ BC at H, draw diameter CF, connect BF, as shown in the figure. Because ∠BAC + ∠EAD = 180°, and ∠BAC + ∠BAF = 180°, therefore ∠DAE = ∠BAF, therefore ⁀{DE} = ⁀{BF}, therefore DE = BF = 6. Since AH ⊥ BC, therefore CH = BH, and CA = AF, therefore AH is the median of △CBF, therefore AH = 1/2 BF = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,A、D是⊙O上的两个点,BC是直径,AD⊥BC,若∠D=35°,则∠OAD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A and D are two points on ⊙O, BC is the diameter, AD ⊥ BC, if ∠D = 35°, then ∠OAD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD is perpendicular to the diameter BC, therefore arc AC = arc CD, ∠APO = 90°, therefore ∠AOC = 2∠D = 2×35° = 70°, thus ∠OAD = 90° - 70° = 20°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,A、B、C为⊙O上三点,且∠OAB=55°,则∠ACB的度数为()度．
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, and ∠OAB = 55°, then the degree of ∠ACB is () degrees.
answer_cot_en: Because ∠OAB = 55°, therefore ∠OBA = 55°, thus ∠O = 180° - 55° - 55° = 70°, therefore ∠ACB = 70° × 1/2 = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,∠A=50°,则∠BOC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, ∠A = 50°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: ∠BOC = 2∠A = 2×50° = 100°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点A、B、C都在⊙O上,若∠AOB=68°,则∠ACB的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵∠AOB与∠ACB是同弧所对的圆心角与圆周角,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=\frac{1}{2}×68°=34°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are all on ⊙O. If ∠AOB = 68°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB and ∠ACB are central and circumferential angles corresponding to the same arc, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 68° = 34°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,∠AOB=40°,则∠ACB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠AOB = 40°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB = 40°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 20°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB于点E,∠CDB=30°,⊙O的半径为3cm,则圆心O到弦CD的距离为()
answer_cot: 连接CB．∵AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB于点E,∴圆心O到弦CD的距离为OE；∵∠COB=2∠CDB(同弧所对的圆周角是所对的圆心角的一半),∠CDB=30°,∴∠COB=60°；在Rt△OCE中,OC=3cm,OE=OC•cos∠COB,∴OE=\frac{3}{2}．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, chord CD ⊥ AB at point E, ∠CDB = 30°, the radius of ⊙O is 3 cm, then the distance from the center O to chord CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect CB. Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, and chord CD is perpendicular to AB at point E, therefore the distance from the center O to the chord CD is OE. Because ∠COB = 2∠CDB (the angle subtended by the same arc on the circumference is half the angle subtended at the center), ∠CDB = 30°, therefore ∠COB = 60°. In right triangle △OCE, OC = 3cm, OE = OC•cos∠COB, therefore OE = 3/2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,在圆O中弦AB∥CD,若∠ABC=50°,则∠BOD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in circle O, chord AB ∥ CD, if ∠ABC = 50°, then ∠BOD equals ()
answer_cot_en: Because chord AB is parallel to CD, and ∠ABC = 50°, therefore ∠C = ∠ABC = 50°, thus ∠BOD = 2∠C = 100°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,A,B,C是⊙O上的三点,∠AOC=50°,则∠ABC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, ∠AOC = 50°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOC = 50°, therefore ∠ABC = 1/2 ∠AOC = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A、B、C是⊙O上的点,若∠ACB=35°,则∠AOB的度数为()
answer_cot: 由圆周角定理可得:∠AOB=2∠ACB=70°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O. If ∠ACB = 35°, then the degree of ∠AOB is ()
answer_cot_en: From the Inscribed Angle Theorem, we can conclude: ∠AOB = 2∠ACB = 70°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点A、C、B、D分别是⊙O上四点,OA⊥BC,∠AOB=50°,则∠ADC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, C, B, and D are four points on ⊙O respectively, OA ⊥ BC, ∠AOB = 50°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA ⊥ BC, therefore arc AC = arc AB, thus ∠ADC = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 50° = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,∠ABO=35°,则∠C的度数等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, ∠ABO = 35°, then the degree of ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, because OA = OB, therefore ∠OAB = ∠ABO = 35°, thus ∠AOB = 180° - (∠OAB + ∠ABO) = 180° - 70° = 110°, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 110° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平面直角坐标系中,⊙A经过原点O,并且分别与x轴、y轴交于B、C两点,已知B(8,0),C(0,6),则⊙A的半径为()
answer_cot: 连接BC,∵∠BOC=90°,∴BC为圆A的直径,即BC过圆心A,在Rt△BOC中,OB=8,OC=6,根据勾股定理得:BC=10,则圆A的半径为5．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the Cartesian coordinate system, ⊙A passes through the origin O, and intersects the x-axis and y-axis at points B and C, respectively. Given B(8,0), C(0,6), then the radius of ⊙A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC, because ∠BOC = 90°, therefore BC is the diameter of circle A, that is, BC passes through the center A. In right triangle BOC, OB = 8, OC = 6, according to the Pythagorean theorem, BC = 10, then the radius of circle A is 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知等边△ABC以BC为直径作圆交AB于D,交AC于E,若BC=2,则CD为()
answer_cot: ∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴∠B=60°,∵BC是⊙O的直径,∴∠BDC=90°,∴CD=BC•sin∠B=2×\frac{√{3}}{2}=√{3}．．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that in the equilateral △ABC, a circle is drawn with BC as the diameter intersecting AB at D and intersecting AC at E. If BC = 2, then CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore ∠B = 60°. Since BC is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠BDC = 90°. Thus, CD = BC•sin∠B = 2×√3/2 = √3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,∠OCB=35°,则∠A的度数等于()
answer_cot: 在△OCB中,OB=OC(⊙O的半径),∴∠OBC=∠0CB(等边对等角)；∵∠OCB=35°,∠C0B=180°-∠OBC-∠0CB,∴∠COB=110°；又∵∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠C0B(同弧所对的圆周角是所对的圆心角的一半),∴∠A=55°,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the circumcircle of △ABC, ∠OCB = 35°, then the degree of ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: In △OCB, OB = OC (radius of ⊙O), therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB (equal sides opposite equal angles); Since ∠OCB = 35°, ∠COB = 180° - ∠OBC - ∠OCB, therefore ∠COB = 110°; Also, since ∠A = 1/2 ∠COB (the angle subtended by the same arc at the circumference is half the angle subtended at the center), therefore ∠A = 55°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是半圆O的直径,∠BAC=60°,D是半圆上任意一点,那么∠D的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of the semicircle O, ∠BAC = 60°, D is any point on the semicircle, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC, because AB is the diameter of the semicircle, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠BAC = 60°, therefore ∠ABC = 90° - ∠BAC = 30°, thus ∠D = ∠ABC = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,P为弧BAC的中点,PD⊥CD交⊙O于A,若AC=AD=1,AB的长为()
answer_cot: 连接PCPBPA,过P做BA垂线于H点∵P为⁀{BAC}的中点∴PB=PC∴∠B=∠C,∠PHB=∠PDA,∴∠BPH=∠DPC,∵在△PBH与△PCD中,\begin{cases}∠B=∠C\\PB=PC\\∠BPH=∠DPC\end{cases},∴△PBH≌△PCD(ASA),∴BH=CD=2,PH=PD,∵在Rt△PHA与Rt△PDA中,\begin{cases}PH=PD\\PA=PA\end{cases},∴Rt△PHA≌Rt△PDA(HL),∴HA=AD=1∴AB=BH+HA=3．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, P is the midpoint of arc BAC, PD ⊥ CD intersects ⊙O at A, if AC = AD = 1, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect PCPBPA, draw a perpendicular line from P to BA at point H. Because P is the midpoint of ⁀{BAC}, therefore PB = PC, therefore ∠B = ∠C, ∠PHB = ∠PDA, thus ∠BPH = ∠DPC. Because in △PBH and △PCD, we have ∠B = ∠C, PB = PC, and ∠BPH = ∠DPC, therefore △PBH ≌ △PCD (ASA), thus BH = CD = 2, PH = PD. Because in right triangle PHA and right triangle PDA, we have PH = PD and PA = PA, therefore right triangle PHA ≌ right triangle PDA (HL), thus HA = AD = 1. Therefore, AB = BH + HA = 3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图A、E、B在⊙O上,圆周角∠ACE=25°,∠BDE=15°,则圆心角∠AOB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, E, and B are on ⊙O, the inscribed angle ∠ACE = 25°, ∠BDE = 15°, then the central angle ∠AOB is () degrees.
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACE = 25°, ∠BDE = 15°, therefore ∠AOE = 50°, ∠BOE = 30°, thus ∠AOB = 80°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C、D在⊙O上,∠AOC=40°,AC∥OD,则的∠BOD度数()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are on ⊙O, ∠AOC = 40°, AC ∥ OD, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA = OC, therefore ∠OAC = ∠AOC = 40°. Since AC ∥ OD, therefore ∠AOD = ∠OAC = 40°, thus ∠BOD = 180° - ∠AOD = 140°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 已知如图:点A、B、C、D在⊙O上,AB为直径,∠ABC=72°,则∠D为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, C, and D are on ⊙O, AB is the diameter, ∠ABC = 72°, then ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠ABC = 72°, therefore ∠A = 18°, thus ∠D = ∠A = 18°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知OB是⊙O的半径,点C、D在⊙O上,∠DCB=40°,则∠BOD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that OB is the radius of ⊙O, points C and D are on ⊙O, ∠DCB = 40°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OB is the radius of ⊙O, and points C, D are on ⊙O, ∠DCB = 40°, therefore ∠BOD = 2∠DCB = 80°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,CD是⊙O的直径,∠BCD=50°,则∠A的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, CD is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠BCD = 50°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BD, because CD is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠CBD = 90°. Since ∠BCD = 50°, therefore ∠D = 90° - ∠BCD = 40°, thus ∠A = ∠D = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,A、B、C三点在⊙O上,若∠BOC=76°,则∠BAC的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵$⁀}$所对的圆心角是∠BOC,圆周角是∠BAC,又∵∠BOC=76°,∴∠A=76°×\frac{1}{2}=38°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O. If ∠BOC = 76°, then the degree of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the central angle corresponding to arc $⁀}$ is ∠BOC, and the inscribed angle is ∠BAC. Given that ∠BOC = 76°, therefore ∠A = 76° × 1/2 = 38°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C是⊙O上的一点,若BC=6,AB=10,OD⊥BC于点D,则OD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on ⊙O. If BC = 6, AB = 10, OD ⊥ BC at point D, then the length of OD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠C = 90°. Since BC = 6, AB = 10, therefore AC = √{AB² - BC²} = 8. Since OD ⊥ BC, therefore OD ∥ AC, and CD = BD, therefore OD is the median of △ABC, thus OD = 1/2 AC = 1/2 × 8 = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,A、B、C是半径为1的⊙O上的三点,∠C=30°,已知则弦AB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O with a radius of 1, ∠C = 30°, then the length of chord AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠C = 30°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠C = 60°. Since OA = OB = 1, therefore △AOB is an equilateral triangle, thus AB = OA = OB = 1. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,AB是直径,∠BAD=30°,∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AB is the diameter, ∠BAD = 30°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in ⊙O, AB is the diameter, therefore ∠ADB = 90°. Since ∠BAD = 30°, therefore ∠B = 90° - ∠BAD = 60°, thus ∠C = ∠B = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点A、B、C是圆O上的三点,OB⊥AC,∠BAC=40°,则∠OCA=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are three points on circle O, OB ⊥ AC, ∠BAC = 40°, then ∠OCA = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BAC = 40°, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 80°. Since OB ⊥ AC, therefore ∠ODC = 90°, thus ∠OCA = 90° - ∠BOC = 10°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,C、D为⊙O上的两点,∠BAC=50°,则∠ADC的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵AB为⊙O的直径,∴∠ACB=90°,∵∠BAC=50°,∴∠ABC=90°-∠BAC=90°-50°=40°,∵∠ABC与∠ADC是同弧所对的圆周角,∴∠ADC=∠ABC=40°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on ⊙O, ∠BAC = 50°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of ⊙O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠BAC = 50°, therefore ∠ABC = 90° - ∠BAC = 90° - 50° = 40°. Because ∠ABC and ∠ADC are angles on the same arc of the circle, therefore ∠ADC = ∠ABC = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,A、B、C是⊙O上的点,若∠AOB=70°,则∠ACB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are points on ⊙O. If ∠AOB = 70°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOB = 2∠ACB, and ∠AOB = 70°, therefore ∠AOC = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 70° = 35°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AC为⊙O的弦,半径OB⊥AC于点D,若∠ACB=22.5°,AD=1,则DB的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AC is a chord of ⊙O, radius OB ⊥ AC at point D. If ∠ACB = 22.5°, AD = 1, then the length of DB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 22.5°, therefore ∠AOB = 45°. Since OB ⊥ AC, therefore ∠OAD = 45°. Hence, AD = DO = 1. Therefore, AO = BO = √(AD² + DO²) = √2. Thus, DB = √2 - 1. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是圆O的直径,∠C=20°,则∠BOC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of circle O, ∠C = 20°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore OC = OA. Since ∠C = 20°, therefore ∠A = ∠C = 20°, thus ∠BOC = 2∠A = 40°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示,⊙O的弦AB、AC的夹角为50°,MN分别为弧AB和弧AC的中点,OM、ON分别交AB、AC于点E、F,则∠MON的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵M、N分别为弧AB和弧AC的中点,∴OF⊥AC,OE⊥AB,∴∠OFA=∠OEA=90°,∴在四边形OEAF中,∠MON=360°-∠OFA-∠OEA-∠A=360°-90°-90°-50°=130°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the angle between chord AB and AC of ⊙O is 50°, MN are the midpoints of arc AB and arc AC respectively, OM and ON intersect AB and AC at points E and F respectively, then the degree of ∠MON is ()
answer_cot_en: Because M and N are the midpoints of arc AB and arc AC respectively, therefore OF ⊥ AC, OE ⊥ AB, therefore ∠OFA = ∠OEA = 90°. Thus, in quadrilateral OEAF, ∠MON = 360° - ∠OFA - ∠OEA - ∠A = 360° - 90° - 90° - 50° = 130°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,从圆上任意一点作弦CD⊥AB,作∠OCD的平分线交⊙O于点P,若AP=5,则BP的值为()
answer_cot: 连接OP,∵OC=OP∴∠OCP=∠OPC,∵CP是∠OCD的角平分线,∴∠OCP=∠DCP,∴∠DCP=∠OPC,∴OP∥CD,∴OP⊥AB,∴弧AP=弧BP,∴AP=BP．∵AP=5,∴BP=5．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, a chord CD is made perpendicular to AB from any point on the circle, the bisector of ∠OCD intersects ⊙O at point P, if AP = 5, then the value of BP is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OP, because OC = OP, therefore ∠OCP = ∠OPC. Since CP is the angle bisector of ∠OCD, therefore ∠OCP = ∠DCP. Hence, ∠DCP = ∠OPC, therefore OP ∥ CD, thus OP ⊥ AB, therefore arc AP = arc BP, hence AP = BP. Given that AP = 5, therefore BP = 5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,P是AB延长线上的一点,PC切⊙O于点C,PC=3,PB=1,则⊙O的半径等于()
answer_cot: ∵PC,PA分别是圆的切线与割线,∴PC²=PB•PA,∵PC=3,PB=1,∴PA=9,AB=8,∴半径为4．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, P is a point on the extension of AB, PC is a tangent to ⊙O at point C, PC = 3, PB = 1, then the radius of ⊙O is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because PC and PA are the tangent and secant of the circle respectively, therefore PC² = PB•PA. Given that PC = 3, PB = 1, therefore PA = 9, AB = 8, thus the radius is 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,AD切⊙O于点A,如果∠ABC=40°,那么∠DAC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, AD is tangent to ⊙O at point A, if ∠ABC = 40°, then ∠DAC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD is tangent to ⊙O at point A, therefore ∠DAC = ∠ABC = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 已知:如图,AB、AC分别切⊙O于B、C,D是⊙O上一点,∠D=40°,则∠A的度数等于()
question_en: Known: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are tangents to ⊙O at points B and C respectively, D is a point on ⊙O, ∠D = 40°, then the degree of ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, OC, because ∠BOC = 2∠D = 80°, therefore ∠OBA = ∠OCA = 90°, thus ∠A = 100°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图．⊙O的半径为5．AB和⊙O切于点B．OA=13．则AB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 5. AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B. OA = 13. Then AB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, then OB ⊥ AB, in right triangle AOB, AO = 13, OB = 5, therefore AB = √{OA² - OB²} = √{13² - 5²} = 12. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA是⊙O的切线,切点为A,PO=2,∠APO=30°,则PA的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OA,如图,∵PA是⊙O的切线,∴OA⊥PA,∴∠OAP=90°,在Rt△OAP中,∵∠APO=30°,∴OA=\frac{1}{2}OP=1,∴PA=√{3}OA=√{3}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, the tangent point is A, PO = 2, ∠APO = 30°, then the length of PA is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, as shown in the figure, because PA is the tangent to ⊙O, therefore OA ⊥ PA, thus ∠OAP = 90°. In right triangle OAP, because ∠APO = 30°, therefore OA = 1/2 OP = 1, thus PA = √3 OA = √3. Hence, the answer is: B.
